subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Khadijah: The Woman Behind the Prophet
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Khadijah: The Woman Behind the Prophet.

hook.text: She was his boss, then his wife. She was the first Muslim. Without Khadijah, there might be no Islam.

buildup.text: Khadijah was a wealthy merchant who hired Muhammad. Impressed by his honesty, she proposed marriage. He was 25, she 40.

discovery.text: When Muhammad received his first revelation and panicked, Khadijah calmed him and affirmed his prophetic calling.

twist.text: She funded the early Muslim community with her own wealth. Islam's first investor was a powerful businesswoman.

climax.text: Muhammad never took another wife while Khadijah lived. He called her the best of all women for the rest of his life.

punchline.text: Islam's first believer was a woman. Khadijah funded and sustained the faith.

quiz.question: Who was Khadijah?
options: Muhammad's wife and the first Muslim
